This technique is a more advanced version of the [[Earth Release: Light-Weight Rock Technique]], in which the user drastically decreases the weight of their target, but to a much greater extent than that of the original ability. The user can use this technique to lift enormous objects that they normally wouldn't be able to such as a [[Tengai Shinsei|meteorite]] or an [[Island Turtle|island]].<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 515, page 1</ref>
